build.buildCommand: cd /migrations && find . -type d -name "migrations" -exec rsync -av --relative {} /app \; && cd -; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install -r requirements.txt; mkdir logs; python manage.py makemigrations; python manage.py migrate; find . -type d -name "migrations" -exec rsync -av --relative {} /migrations/ \;
